## Punto 2

```{r}
dat<- read.csv2("Datos_taller1.csv")

dat2<- dat %>%  group_by(Bosque, Parcela) %>% summarise(n_ind= length(Parcela))

anova <- aov(n_ind ~ Bosque, data = dat2)

a<- HSD.test(anova, "Bosque", console = T)

a$groups
```
